Player History
Drafted in 6th round, 68th overall pick, by Los Angeles in 2019...
Had first career hit on 4/2/2019, off Rafael Gonzalez (PIT)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/6/2019, off James Clanton (TOR)...
Won Player of the Week award on 4/24/2019, hitting .414 with 3 HR, 12 RBI...
Was selected to the 2019 Allstar game...
1/31/2020: Gets a new one-year contract worth $3,178,571 through salary arbitration...
Signed as a free agent by Toronto on 2/1/2021 to a 3-year deal worth $5,750,000 per year...
